description:
A powerful, lightweight, yet full-featured screen capture tool and screen video recorder.

A powerful, lightweight, yet full-featured screen capture tool that allows you to easily capture and annotate anything on the screen including windows, objects, menus, full screen, rectangular/freehand regions and even scrolling windows/web pages. It also allows you to record screen activities, sound and webcam into MP4 video files.
- Added "Transparent background" option to Edge tool
- Added "Delete File" (Ctrl+Del) to editor's File menu
- Enhanced support for multi-monitor systems
- Enabled copying and pasting transparent images directly via Clipboard
- Updated Caption tool to fully display long text, such as URL links
- Implemented automatic adjustment of Caption tool's header color to a bright tone when background is dark
- Other improvements and bug fixes
